people.name: Jeff Ramos
people.description:
Jeff hails from Porto Alegre, Brazil and has over 17 years experience in game development using a wide range of technologies.

Passionate about game feel and user experience, Jeff started Hyperchip as a way of continuing his mission to always create and always bring something new to the table.

people.name: Josie Prebble
people.description: Josie has previously worked as a musician and educator and has recently moved to UX Design as a way of continuing to grow her artistic skills while utilising her knowledge of human behaviour to create fun and engaging experiences.
